Title: bitTestAny
Feature: SELECT bitTestAny(number, index1, index2, index3, index4, ...)
Description: Returns result of logical disjunction (OR operator) of all bits at given positions. Counting is right-to-left, starting at 0.
SELECT bitTestAny(number, index1, index2, index3, index4, ...)
number – Integer number.index1, index2, index3, index4 – Positions of bit.
Result of the logical disjunction. UInt8.
